com.quantcomponents.marketdata
Interface IStockDatabaseContainer

All Known Implementing Classes:
MemoryStockDatabaseContainer
public interface IStockDatabaseContainer

Container for stock databases. Used to decouple the IMarketDataManager from the storage of stock databases. Implementations can use database persistence of other methods. The key to stock databases is their persistent ID.

See Also:
IPersistentIdentifiable

Method Summary

          Add a stock database to the storage

          Remove a stock database from storage

          Return the number of stock databases found in the container
